WELCOME GUESTS FROM CHILE; There need be no reservations in the welcome that President Truman and the American people give to President Gabriel Gonzalez Videla of Chile and his party who have arrived in the United States on a three-week visit of state.

docs.snippet: The Maritime Commission yesterday approved the application of Moore-McCormack Lines for the resumption of an operating differential subsidy on the three "Good Neighbor Fleet" liners Brazil, Uruguay and Argentina.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Maritime Commission yesterday approved the application of Moore-McCormack Lines for the resumption of an operating differential subsidy on the three "Good Neighbor Fleet" liners Brazil, Uruguay and Argentina.
docs.abstract: Maritime Comm approves Moore-McCormack subsidy on NYC-Buenos Aires run; to ask bids on new charter contract with proviso that bidder add new tonnage to route

headline.main: MOORE-M'CORMACK WILL GET SUBSIDY; Commission Backs Request Involving the Operation of 'Good Neighbor Fleet'

docs.snippet: CHICAGO, April 13 (AP)--Swift International Company, Ltd., has called a special meeting of shareholders for May 22 to act on a reorganization plan, it was announced today.
docs.lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, April 13 (AP)--Swift International Company, Ltd., has called a special meeting of shareholders for May 22 to act on a reorganization plan, it was announced today.

docs.snippet: ACCOMPANYING the growing interest in the Caribbean islands as a spring and summer vacationland is the ex  pansion of steamship service to the islands from ports along the eastern seaboard.
